fields.headline: Special Offer on Compaq iPAQ
fields.bodyText: The Compaq iPAQ H3630: · Designed to go everywhere with you - work, play, travel · Comes with Pocket PC version of Microsoft Outlook, Pocket World, Excel, and Pocket Internet Explorer · Internet/wireless ready* - check your emails wherever you are · Download and play your favourite video clips* and play the latest games* · Listen to music using the built-in Windows Media Player · Enjoy some reading with an ebook · Seamless synchronization with your PC · Brilliant clear screen · Thin, lightweight and easy to use Buy an iPAQ from www.jungle.com/netjetters today and you will get 40% off the price of a Samsung Laser Printer AND £10 off your next jungle.com purchase. Simply visit www.jungle.com/netjetters to take advantage of this great deal.
